name: adc_gtm_pool_list
scriptContent:
from appviewx import db_connection
connect_db = db_connection()


def getGTMPoolList():
    '''
    To get GTM pool list

    '''

    gtm_pool_list = []
    db_filter = {'code': 'gp'}
    adc_gtm_pool_list = connect_db.appviewx.ro.find(db_filter)
    for device in adc_gtm_pool_list:
        gtm_pool_list.append(device)
    return gtm_pool_list
description: To get a list of GTM pool
_keywords: To get a list of GTM pool
